name: Range Ball
description: A puzzle in which colored blocks are pushed from above and the player has to break them with a ball. Make sure that the color of the ball and the color of the tile match.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 50 MB available space
